headline: Textron Aviation Enhances Parts Shipment Visibility With Sensos Smart Labels Technology
summary: WICHITA, Kan., October 10, 2025--Sensos Smart Labels are now available through Textron Aviation parts, offering customers the option of real-time tracking of their parts shipments.

headline: Starlink High-Speed Internet Now Available on the Cessna Citation Longitude, Enhancing In-Flight Connectivity Across More Destinations
summary: WICHITA, Kan., October 10, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) company, today announced an additional high-speed internet connectivity solution for the Cessna Citation Longitude, following the Federal Aviation Administration’s (FAA) issuance of AeroMech’s Supplemental Type Certificate (STC) for Starlink high-speed internet connectivity. AeroMech’s STC utilizes Starlink’s constellation of Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellites to provide more reliable connectivity over land, water a

headline: Why Textron (TXT) is a Top Momentum Stock for the Long-Term
summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.

headline: What Textron (TXT)'s New Army Contracts Signal for Its Role in Defense Modernization
summary: On September 22, Textron Systems delivered the XM204 Top Attack Munition to the U.S. Army under an initial production contract, following certification of its advanced capabilities, while Bell Textron selected Marotta Controls to supply a static inverter for the Army’s Future Long Range Assault Aircraft (FLRAA) program. These developments highlight Textron's increased integration into major U.S. defense modernization initiatives and its expanding influence in next-generation military...
